author: Simon Difford
description: A Pineapple Daiquiri lengthened with soda. You'll be surprised just how tasty and refreshing this drink is.
name: Pineapple Fizz
recipeIngredient: 50 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
12.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain in ice-filled glass whilst also pouring soda,
